name: Atomowe Drezyny
description:
Local multiplayer game for 4 people. First pair to hit their opponents 3 times wins.

  • press left / right triggers interchangeably to increase your speeed
  • use left / right sticks to aim at the opposing pair
  • when you're aiming in the right direction, confirm fire by pressing left and right bumpers at the same time
  • you only get one bullet, but can reload it by staying in the designated resupply zone for a short while

Developed by:

  • Kacper Domański
  • Łukasz Spierewka
